an6.91:1.1: “Mendicants, an individual accomplished in view can’t give rise to six things.
an6.91:1.3: Substantialist view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances, and forms of greed, hate, and delusion that lead to rebirth in places of loss.
an6.91:1.4: An individual accomplished in view can’t give rise to these six things.”
